title: 228. Q&AF: 14-Year-Old Entrepreneur, Getting People To Believe & Unrealized Potential In Others
itunes:title: 228. Q&AF: 14-Year-Old Entrepreneur, Getting People To Believe & Unrealized Potential In Others
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what to do when people don't take you seriously because of your age, how to get people to believe in your ultimate mission, and how to handle someone who has potential but hasn't realized it yet.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what to do when people don't take you seriously because of your age, how to get people to believe in your ultimate mission, and how to handle someone who has potential but hasn't realized it yet.
